title: Add jail.nix support to devenv plugin
description:
Add support for jail.nix (https://git.sr.ht/~alexdavid/jail.nix) to the /devenv plugin for sandboxed development environments.

## What is jail.nix?

A Nix library that wraps derivations in bubblewrap for security sandboxing:
- Minimal permissions by default
- Combinators for permissions: network, gui, gpu, readonly, rw-bind
- Flake integration: inputs.jail-nix.url = "sourcehut:~alexdavid/jail.nix"
- Automatic path escaping for security

## Current devenv Plugin Architecture

- Location: plugins/devenv/
- Commands: commands/devenv.md (702 lines) - Initialize/manage flows
- Hooks: PostToolUse for nixfmt, statix, deadnix
- Config: .claude/devenv.local.md for user preferences

## Implementation Approach

1. Add jail.nix to security tools selection (alongside pre-commit, gitleaks)
2. Add sandbox policy options: strict, standard, permissive
3. Update flake template with jail.nix input
4. Wrap packages with jail combinators based on policy
5. Add management menu option for existing environments
design:
## Files to Modify

- plugins/devenv/commands/devenv.md - Add jail.nix to security tools flow
- plugins/devenv/README.md - Document sandboxing feature
- plugins/devenv/.claude-plugin/plugin.json - Add keywords

## Flake Template Changes

Add input:
```nix
inputs.jail.url = "sourcehut:~alexdavid/jail.nix";
```

Initialize in outputs:
```nix
jail = inputs.jail.lib.init pkgs;
```

Wrap packages:
```nix
packages = with pkgs; [
  (jail.wrap nodejs [ jail.network ])
  (jail.wrap python3 [ jail.network (jail.readonly "/etc") ])
];
```

## Configuration

Add to .claude/devenv.local.md:
```yaml
use_jail_sandbox: false
jail_policy: standard  # strict, standard, permissive
```

## Policy Presets

- strict: No network, no GUI, minimal filesystem
- standard: Network access, read-only common paths
- permissive: Network + GUI + GPU access
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] jail.nix appears in security tools selection during init
- [ ] User can choose sandbox policy (strict/standard/permissive)
- [ ] Generated flake.nix includes jail.nix input when selected
- [ ] Packages wrapped with appropriate combinators per policy
- [ ] Existing environments can add sandboxing via manage flow
- [ ] Configuration persisted in devenv.local.md
- [ ] nix flake check passes with jail.nix integration
- [ ] README documents jail.nix feature
